item.name: StyleN.First_Left_Indent
item.description:
Type "N".
Indent of first line of paragraph.

section.title: Description
section.description: The RTF Memo Editor supports up to 8 different styles. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.example: dim obj as P obj = :Customer_Information:rtfmemofield.this obj.rtf.insert_text("This is RTF text") obj.rtf.style1.name = "My Style" obj.rtf.style1.left_indent = 1 obj.rtf.style1.right_indent = 1 ? obj.rtf.style.1 = First_Left_Indent = 0 Left_Indent = 1 Name = "My Style" Right_Indent = 1 +Tab.
